content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Howdy!!

Using grounding in this conversation helps enrich the connection between the presented droodle and the evolving narrative, ensuring that any proposed title closely aligns with visual elements. By emphasizing the relationship between story components and image details, we enhance creativity and ensure a more engaging caption emerges.
